name: Patagonia Ponderosa Pine Roll Neck Sweater - Men's
description:
Great for shoulder seasons, this just-right sweater layers easily. It's made from a blend of organic cotton and polyester so it adds warmth without making you feel too bundled up.THERMOLITE® polyester hollow-core yarn traps heat, wicks moisture and dries quickly.Soft jersey knit layers well.Rolled neck, cuffs and hem have a hand-crafted look.
